publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1459 Bill Aitken: The Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Home Detention Curfew Licence (Prescribed Standard Conditions) (Scotland) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/36).
